column5: I thought it said "what a great beard".  Was expecting a portrait of an impressive beard  Like This perhaps.    Just for the record, I like this board as well.
Thanks.. looks like were gonna need HVAC and Welding subforums.... ahhhgg... llol
I need another keyboard......Again  Or at least one thats water proof
Best Web site on the planet if you ask me.... Great community too
Did your water break Paul?

Oh Brian, Stifle would ya, LOL... (btw, be at the spring show, boxing gloves in hand  )  I think it's flipped.  The Mods have made this board, they are quick with a joke or to lite up your smoke, but don't think about pulling the wool over their eyes.
Dont forget to add a "fix my ford" will ya boss.Not picking on G here,as I own one too.LOL   Hey Phil,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,never mind,,,,,,,
Ya its all Unicorns and Double Rainbows here.. where is the conflict? Where are the idiot internet tough guys trolling on everyone? I'm not used to this
"idiot internet tough guys " are quickly filtered out..  we do after all have youngen's on this board...

My son and I wre scanning some other sites regarding fishing.  This is why we are so proud to be a member of this board. It is like night and day. This board stands out and way above the others. After scanning the others and it was only for 2 to 3 minutes getting back to the OFC was like coming home after being on the road for 3 weeks. TO EACH AND EVERY FELLOW MEMBER YOUR THE BEST. THANKS TJ as well for all you do.
What..  You mean like the LSMB as of lately  A big thanks to the Mods here..  You guys are great!
Thanks guys, yes this is an awesome community.  Let's not turn this thread into a bashing platform for other sites please.
It's just like a pair of old shoes or your favorite lure. Always someone here to help out.
They have other   Forum's?
I been invited to other boards...pfft . As if?  OFC all the way!!  I call OFC  community home..
Roy has to spoil all the fun. bah hum bug.  YA BABY, coming from this DUDE right here!
No better place to be. Especially the quality people.

This site has always been the best for solid fishing info, but the sense of "family" that you get here is unmatched anywhere. I don't bother much with other fishing boards anymore, but for things like welding and such, I do go to other forums. They are radically different. You can get info, but the warm fuzzy feeling just isn't there.  This board has helped so many of us through tough times and we have celebrated good times! Nothing else quite like it that I have found! "Fishing" is just the common bond that brings us here.
I concur !!! A fine group of guys and gals aways ready to help and listen.One Big Familly.Glad you are all here!!!!! Cause I,m not all there!!!!
I agree 150% with the above statement,He has so many screws loose he needs to give away screwdrivers for maintenance  BTW What is the other end for, letting air out of tires?

I have been a member for years but I have not been posting for while, but I always find myself coming back. Always someone here willing to help out and answer a question, many of the regulars have been hear a long time and I believe are truly interested helping people out. This is the only fishing messageboard I visit and am a member of.
putting valves in HVAC systems......DUHHH !!!!!!
I belong to a couple other boards, but this is my home and where I spend the vast majority of the time.  Just a great site, great people, great mods, etc. etc. etc.

yup. Kudos to everyone for the humor, the help, the community spirit, the protective nature of our fishery, the arguments, the locked threads and all the other entertainment I forgot to mention...   oh and the mods, can't forget the mods. I wouldn't "mod"ify anything about you guys... two drums and a cybal falling off a cliff.
x2

If you have ever watched the movie"grumpy old men" well this is what this site is. Sure you will be called a putz or moron,or told to s t f u,but when it comes down to the bare bones,this site is caring and well ,A FAMILY.   I would like to thank the mods aswell,but it would go to thier heads.  It,s the members that make the board,mods are here to lock ya up when you get out of hand.

And Joey's recipe for beef jerky rocks. Big Chevy looks larger than life every time we see him, even at the grocery store. Thanks again for all your support, from the lose of our daughter thru to the advice of how to repair our shower stall. It worked, a year later and it is still has not fallen down. Again thank you all and in the words of Montgomery Gentry " It's something to be proud of"!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Must be gettin close to Valentines Day or sumfin
you went ahead and got your own new emoticons. hahaha   Classic OFC drama.
you like em....dont ya
Great board with great members
Definitely a great community.  Frequently helpful.  Rarely judgemental.
I love you guys (and girls).
